condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all four sides. Two large holes at the top and bottom right sides have resulted in the loss of three to four words at the beginning of four lines. There are some smaller holes in the papyrus. Written in black ink with a thin pen, perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. Two horizontal folding lines have damaged the ink and fibers of several lines at the beginning of the text and one line towards the end of the letter.
